commit.message:
Use movl instead of movabs for x32.

2011-07-10  H.J. Lu  <hongjiu.lu@intel.com>

	* config/i386/i386.c (ix86_trampoline_init): Use movl instead
	of movabs for x32.

From-SVN: r176129

+	of movabs for x32.
